SUMMARY: REQUIRED | OPTIONAL DETAIL: ELEMENT

me.prettyprint.hom.annotations
Annotation Type Column

@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=FIELD)
public @interface Column

Annotation for specifying which POJO properties should be mapped to Cassandra columns. Must specify "name" as the column name in Cassandra.

Author:

Required Element Summary
 String name
          The Cassandra column name.
 
Optional Element Summary
 Class<? extends Converter> converter
          The optional converter to use when converting POJO property value to/from byte[].
 

Element Detail

name

public abstract String name
The Cassandra column name.

Returns:
name of column

converter

public abstract Class<? extends Converter> converter
The optional converter to use when converting POJO property value to/from byte[]. If not specified, DefaultConverter is used.

Returns:
Class of converter
Default:
me.prettyprint.hom.converters.DefaultConverter.class
